You see, it's all about creating an environment of fear, respect, and dependence. My subordinates know that I'm the one who provides for them, who protects them, and who makes the tough decisions. But it's not just about leading by example. I also make sure to reward loyalty and punish disloyalty. If someone proves themselves to be loyal, I make sure they're taken care of. They get the best jobs, the best pay, and the best protection. On the other hand, if someone betrays me or even thinks about betraying me, they'll suffer the consequences. And I don't just mean a slap on the wrist. I mean pain, suffering, and humiliation. I make examples out of those who cross me, so that everyone else knows what's at stake.
